attributes.review: i downloaded the app a few weeks ago cause i’m a new voter and you mean to tell me that it crashes 24/7.🤬 i’ve used this app twice within the last two weeks and both times it restarted my phone so all my trillary💞 edits deleted😔 on top of that all of my baby beans died because i couldn’t reach them. please rate this app at 1 and get justice for my baby beans😫😢😡🤬
attributes.title: just unbelievable

attributes.review: to be honest, i was excited about getting the app, but to my displeasure, the app took about two weeks to load, and once it did, it made my phone crash over and over again until it just shut down. i even put it in rice. overall the app just sucked. like have🤔you😒ever😔been😡snaked🐍by🙃a🤨 friend👧then😪just😾for 🤦the🗣️clout👀they'll😈do😣it😕again🙄

attributes.review:
do not get this app!! i downloaded the app and my phone started to stop functioning correctly. i started getting tons of emails spammed to my account, and some of my apps actually got hacked. don’t download this app because it’s taken me days to get my phone to go back to normal. stole all of my information and used up sooo much data.  don’t download this app. #blacklivesmatter
#anyoneelse2020
attributes.title: hacked my phone
